message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this amazing product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this fantastic item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $180. What do you think?
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $140. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $160. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $145?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $145. I'm willing to make another concession and offer it to you for $155. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm trying to stick to my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $149?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $152. This is as low as I can go. What do you think?
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm trying to stick to my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $149?

I've already made several concessions, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than $152. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'm going to have to consider other options. Would you like to reconsider?
